name: Alan Saves Christmas
description:
Alan Saves Christmas was the first point-and-click adventure game I made and I learnt a lot from it!

The story begins when the ministry of holidays receives a letter from Santa saying that he's not going to be delivering any toys this year. Being rather short staffed they send a mild mannered accountant named Alan to try and find out what's going on...

This game was made in around 25 days for the December 2007 Monthly Adventure Game Studio (MAGS) competition over at the Adventure Game Studio forums.

Controls:
Left mouse - walk/use
Right mouse - Examine
Move the cursor to the top of the screen to show the inventory with the options button.
